categories.Positive sentiment: Text expresses positive emotions, satisfaction, happiness, or optimistic outlook.
categories.Negative sentiment: Text expresses negative emotions, dissatisfaction, sadness, or pessimistic outlook.
categories.Neutral sentiment: Text is factual or objective without strong emotional content.
categories.Mixed sentiment: Text contains both positive and negative emotional elements.
categories.Question or inquiry: Text is primarily asking for information or clarification.
categories.Complaint or criticism: Text expresses dissatisfaction with a product, service, or situation.
categories.Praise or compliment: Text expresses appreciation, admiration, or positive feedback.
categories.Request or demand: Text is asking for action to be taken or something to be provided.
categories.Informational: Text is primarily sharing facts, data, or objective information.
categories.Other: Text does not fit clearly into any of the above categories.
